name: Do The Same for SEGA MASTERSYSTEM
name_original: Do The Same for SEGA MASTERSYSTEM
description:
After MSX version, here is the Sega Mastersystem version

I've decided to submit DTS to the SMSdev compo 2022 but I've used MSX/COLECO graphics and poor sounds. https://www.smspower.org/Homebrew/DoTheSame-SMS

Now, the game is finished and contains many jingles, sfx and 4 great musics done by Tobikomi, a great and efficient artist (one for the menu and three differents for the game, one by difficulty level) and Kagesan another great graphic artist. Thx to you my friends :)

For a better music experience, please switch to 50hz :)

This is a 96kb rom. This version contains only the first level (16 stages). The webscore code is not present.

GOAL

You have to reproduce a 'picture' by rotating a four squares tileset.  You can win an EXTRA LIFE every 300pts and you can save your score on the web by using your webscorecode  on http://ricco59em.free.fr/dts/  

Be fast, be the best
Enjoy!

CONTROLS

STICK to move your cursor
LEFT FIRE or RIGHT FIRE to rotate the tileset clockwise or anti-clockwise
HOLD FIRE1 to QUIT Game
HOLD FIRE2 to RESTART a stage. It'll be possible if your score is > 100pts but if you decide to restart a stage, you'll loose 20pts!
